elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []Target Character gains 1 boost and [[Fleeting]].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} []I gain 1 boost per card in your Reserve.  When my Expedition moves forward — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: At Dusk — If I have 1 or more boosts: You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: At Dusk — You may pay {1}. If you do: You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} If your Reserve is empty: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.  {H} []You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: I gain 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may pay {1}. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: [Sabotage], otherwise [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When a Character in your Reserve gains 1 or more boosts — []You may give target [[Fleeting]] Character 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may pay {1}. If you do: Up to two target Characters in play or in Reserve each gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} If your Reserve is empty: Target Character other than me gains 1 boost.  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — []Up to two target Characters in play or in Reserve each gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: At Dusk — If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you have two or more cards in Reserve: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: At Dusk — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When my Expedition moves forward — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you have two or more cards in Reserve: You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.  {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may discard target Permanent with Hand Cost {3} or less.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: Up to one target Character gains [[Asleep]]. You may give it 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Each Artist you control other than me gains 1 boost.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} []I don't count towards your Reserve limit.
